## Change Logs

**Attention**: This beta version is set as _latest release_ in GitHub. Beta versions will receive updates until the official release. If you find bugs, please open an [issue on GitHub](https://github.com/Electron-Minecraft-Launcher/EML-AdminTool/issues).

### Changes

* NeoForge Loader and Quilt Loader are now supported in _Files Updater_.

### Bug fixes and improvements

* Fixed an issue where `.env` file variables were not properly loaded in some environments, causing POST requests to fail.

### Known issues

* Error page/notification does not always display the corresponding error message.

## How to upgrade

### First-time setup

Please follow [this guide](https://emlproject.pages.dev/docs/required-knowledge) to install EML AdminTool for the first time.

### Upgrading from a previous version

Make sure that Docker is installed on your server, and the default Docker socket is available at `/var/run/docker.sock`.
